naslov: KAŠTELIR VILA SA BAZENOM: Labinci, 180.00 m2 (prodaja)
opis: Prodaje se prelijepa vila sa bazenom na lijepoj mirnoj lokaciji u Istarskom gradiću Kaštelir .Kuća je građena 2018 god. i izrađena je u modrenom stilu sa istarskim motivima kamena .Površina kuće je 180 m2 i dvorište od 436 m2 .Kuća je prizemlje i prvi kat .U prizemlju se nalazi hodnik koji vodi u dnevnu sobu ,jedilnicu i kuhinju ,jedna soba i jedna kupaona .Po stepenicama se dodje na 1 katu gdje su 2 kupaone i 3 spavaće sobe .Kuća je kvalitetno rađena od stolarije ,podova ,kupaonice su sa kvalitetnom keramikom u modernom stilu,klima uređaji su po sobama za grijanje i hlađenje U uređenom dvorištu je bazen i natkrivena terasa 40 m2 za uzivanje sa pogledom na more .U dvorištu je parking za 2-3 automobila.Kuća je na 10 km od Poreča . Kuća ima energetski certifikat A . Kuća ima svu potrebnu dokumentaciju urednu (vlasnički list ,građevinska dozvola ,uporabna dozvola ). --- A beautiful villa with a swimming pool for sale in a nice, quiet location in the Istrian town of Kaštelir. The house was built in 2018. and it is made in a blue style with Istrian stone motifs. The surface of the house is 180 m2 and the yard is 436 m2. The house has a ground floor and a first floor. On the ground floor there is a corridor that leads to the living room, dining room and kitchen, one room and one bathroom. The stairs lead to the first floor where there are 2 bathrooms and 3 bedrooms. The house is made of quality woodwork, floors. , the bathrooms are with high-quality ceramics in a modern style, there are air conditioners in the rooms for heating and cooling. In the landscaped yard there is a swimming pool and a covered terrace of 40 m2 for enjoying with a view of the sea. There is parking for 2-3 cars in the yard. The house is 10 km from Poreč. The house has an energy certificate A. The house has all the necessary documentation in order (ownership certificate, building permit, occupancy permit).
Grijanje: Sustav grijanja: Sustav grijanja, klimatizacije i ventilacije
